name: Masterful Display

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dazzling Display, any two performance feats.

sections.text: Choose the effects of any two performance feats you have. When you make a performance combat check, you gain the benefits of those two feats, but you only gain a +2 bonus on the performance combat check.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You craft a special victory performance that causes the crowd to go wild.
